note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
# Addons for Prestashop

This fork support small addons to [Prestashop](http://www.prestashop.com) :
* new hooks in the backoffice product page
* background bulk CSV import.

If you don't already have your very own Prestashop running then you can get an already patched Prestashop by clicking the links at top of the page.

Alternatively you can apply a single patch to your 1.5.2 tree (only this release is provided).
    prestashop$ patch -p1 < /x/y/z/where/is/the/patch.file
name: Prestashop
